original_text: I urged Titus to go to you and I sent our brother with him. Titus did not exploit you, did he? Did we not walk in the same footsteps by the same Spirit?
korean_text: 내가 디도를 권하고 함께 한 형제를 보내었으니 디도가 너희의 이득을 취하더냐 우리가 동일한 성령으로 행하지 아니하더냐 동일한 보조로 하지 아니하더냐

sentences.original_text: I urged Titus to go to you
and I sent our brother with him
Titus did not exploit you, did he?
Did we not walk in the same footsteps
